distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for curl fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-32001: Fixed TOCTOU race condition (bsc#1213237).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: ** REJECT ** We issued this CVE pre-maturely, as we have subsequently realized that this issue points out a problem that there really is no safe measures around or protections for.
notes.title: CVE description
